item.description:
@HOT_babe wrote:

i could help with q and mini games.

Bad idea that i would need to add spawn etc, dialogues and that.
About minigames.
For ex lets take barrows - you want it to be like in rs or custom command etc ::barrows that tele u to first grave than after beating 1 noob u tele to other OR u need tu tele to graveyard, use spade and get into every single grave by urself and after beating u gtg back to gyard and do it again?

item.title: 317 runescape remake
item.dc:creator: @RSC_n33b RSC_n33b
item.description:
@RSC_n33b wrote:

[quote=“wolfs goal, post:4, topic:252454”]well some noob was talking bout choosing your characters destiny at log in…

so when you log in you choose

pure
ranger
mage
melee
strengther
skiller

or multi

after chosing it saves to your file…

basically like this

playerisranger = true;

then when you try training combat it does this

if(plr.!attack());
importplayer.attack(file.destiny/+attack+/+skills);

then you can use those…but if your not attack…

if(plr.!range() && plr.!attack());
plrtext = “Man i’m a noob for trying to break my destiny!”;
plrtextupdaterequired = true;
resetplr.!attack() = true;
resetattack;
resetpos;
}

so basically you can make a goal and be forced to keep it

ty mystery noob![/quote]
WOW i wish i read the code better thats really nice
good idea

Read full topic

item.title: 317 runescape remake
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

well some noob was talking bout choosing your characters destiny at log in…

so when you log in you choose

pure
ranger
mage
melee
strengther
skiller

or multi

after chosing it saves to your file…

basically like this

playerisranger = true;

then when you try training combat it does this

if(plr.!attack());
importplayer.attack(file.destiny/+attack+/+skills);

then you can use those…but if your not attack…

if(plr.!range() && plr.!attack());
plrtext = “Man i’m a noob for trying to break my destiny!”;
plrtextupdaterequired = true;
resetplr.!attack() = true;
resetattack;
resetpos;
}

so basically you can make a goal and be forced to keep it

ty mystery noob!

Read full topic
